problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following is a goal of TPS? <<
( ) Maximize production ( ) To acquire the greatest market share ( ) Maximize automation ( ) Minimize idle time (x) Minimize waste
[Explanation] TPS's main intention is to minimize waste. Waste can include uncecessary movement, setup time, overproduction, excessive WIP and machine downtime. [Explanation]
